Room.Name: Overland Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Overland Drive, north of Nagaritha Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Overland Drive intersects Nagaritha Drive a little way to the south. On the east side of the road, you can see the vast Chateau Richland Grape Orchard. The west side of the road is dominated by the Circle-Bar Ranch House and the Cattle Ranch, where most of the cattle in Oceancrest are raised and slaughtered.
